kawo hama ekekma wikinena mohothak thibenawa.ath adanguwata gaththama yan yan janadhipathi hambawenna kiyapu wijewirage mila eetharam loku ekak noweyi.sathiyak athulatha siyalla pawa dun deshapalana mandalaye milath epamana loku naha.kappetipola ha sumangala hamuduruwo miladi ganna kisima kenek aawe na.bandaranayakage muththarata pawa dunna habayi mage muththa rata pawa dunne na.ehema wune bandage muththata wada mage muththa deshapremi ho pragathishili wuna nisa noweyi.mage muththata wikinenne kojomada kiyala awabodhayak thibune na.mage muththath kohomada rata wawala denne kiyala balanna suddange bangalawe doratuwe horagal ahulana kota sudda me mokekda kiyala elawa gaththatahda danneth na.anika mage muththa mithya matah walin welila ohe kumbauru kotanna athi.bandalage mmuththala wideshiya bhasha igena gena kithudahama hadarala sarthaka wuna.adugane rendayakwath karaganna hati ape muththalata therune na.oya kiyana deshapremaya ,samajawadaya pattapal boru.habayi eethula pirisakata sarthaka wenna puluwan.wikinenne nathi mionihek na.samaharu wikinenne na wage penunata wenath prathilabha labanawa.dan deshapremi ha en ji oo kiyala merate depirisak innawa.deshapremi aya deshiya pragdhanaya ganath en ji oo aya wideshiya pragdhanaya ganath wishwasa karanawa.me siyalla kanta manga suththara thamayiwikinenne nathi un na.habayi smahara un kawuruwath milata ganne na.ethakota kiyanawa api wikinenne kiyala.wimal aanduwata gihin sapa widinawa.namuth je wi pi eke inna aya wideshiya pragdhanaya matha sapa widinawa.

aparadhakaruwan wenuwen ratathula ellum gaha kriyathmaka kara nisi danduwam laba dennayi balakaramin anuradhapura, wihara halmillakulama pradeshaye ikuth (4) da ghathanayata lak wu ekama pawule pasdena pilibanda shokaya palakaramin mahasangharathnaya pramukha ghathanayata lakwuwange gnyathihu eeye (7) sawasa wirodhathawaka niratha wuha.ghathanayata lakwuwange dehayan owun padinchiwa siti niwase thanpath karathibu dehayan awasan katayuthu sidukirima sandaha wiharahalmillakulama podu susana bhumiyata rugena yana awasthawe di niwesa idiripita margaye dehayan da thaba janathawa me mini maru amanayanta ellum gaha kriyathmaka karannayi illa sitiyaha.warthamanaya wanawita aparate minis ghathanayan wardhanaya wi aththe owunta nisi daduwam nolabima hethuwen bawath, mewani aparadhakaruwanta kisidu ayurakin nidahasak laba nodemin ghathanayata lakwuwange pawulwala ayage manawa ayithin surakina lesa da udghoshanaye nirithawu janathawa illa sitiyeya.esema me ghathana sidu kala aparadhakaru hata kisidu nithignyayaku peninositina lesa da janathawa illim kaleya.
apita kiyawanna thawa tikak wisthara karala thibbanam godak watinawa....
